message.content:
I need to identify and extract the line item and value of assets held for sale in the ordinary course of business, which would be inventory.

Looking at the balance sheet, I can see the line item "Inventory" which represents goods held for sale in the ordinary course of business.

The initial value of Inventory is 0.00 as of 2023-12-31.
The end value of Inventory is 975000.00 as of 2024-01-29.

This is the asset that meets the description in the task as it represents items held for sale in the ordinary course of business.

```json
{"solution": {'initial value': '0.00', 'end value': '975000.00'}}
```
